idea: Werkon is an innovative, fresh and one of the fastest-growing tech-based recruitment company that offers you flexibility and professionalism with flexible time and plans of hiring for clients. We have a good team and different skill set for the hiring as per the client requirement by different parameters that are set as per the company policy of hiring. Our company established as a recruitment company in the market in the year 2019.
name: Werkon

idea:
Greetings from Voltaar Electrical and Security Systems


Voltaar Electrical and Security Systems was founded by Mr. Jagdish Yadav & Mr. Sunil Mourya. Company was established & incorporated in August 2019, with the registered office at Ulhasnagar, Mumbai in the State of Maharashtra. We are dealing with electrical as well as in Security Systems also, apart from this we Provide all types of Material & Services related to the Electrical, CCTV, Fire Alarm Systems, Public Addressable Systems, Access Control Systems, Water Leak Detection Systems, Rodent Systems, BMS Systems, Fire Extinguisher Systems, Fire Sprinkler Systems & Fire Hydrant Systems
name: Voltaar Electrical and Security Systems

idea:
Pool It! is an initiative, a start-up to encourage people to share auto-rickshaws so that they can share the auto fares and contribute towards our mother earth.

Our work is simple. With the help of a mobile app, we will simply connect people traveling to a similar destination from a similar location in a rickshaw.
 
This will minimize both environmental as well as accounting cost to 1/3rd.
name: Samyak Jain

idea: Travel Kattaa Will be AI based personal travel assistant app that will Cater to People from All Over the world.
name: TRAVEL KATTAA TOURS AND TRAVELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Career Counseling using new age technologies blended with psychometric.
name: POTENZIALS EDUCATION
DIVISIONAL FORENSIC SCIENCE LABORATORY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We operate a venture under brand name Skyll.Me focussed on employability and productivity. We skill college passouts and make them employable for BFSI jobs. We also focus on improving productivity levels of existing corporate employees.


We have a blended approach to training- Online and Classroom both, with focus on how to do things practically so that our certified students are able to perform from day one after joining a job. 


Learning is imparted through a Web and Android based application, Physical Classes, Virtual Classes, Case Studies and Practical Field work.
name: CERKA SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
BIZCAP Trades is into identifying the right upcoming retail brands (both MNC & Indian) to evaluate and explore an option of Franchisee business with such brands.


We intend to explore brands which are creating innovative products that are ensuring an enhanced lifestyle to the end consumer and are solving some or the other day to day needs / problems for these consumers.
name: BIZCAP Trades LLP
